snippet: “Care of Wooden Floors,” a novel that sprung from the author’s experience house-sitting, examines the desire for a perfect domestic life.
abstract: Will Wiles, author of novel Care of Wooden Floors, tale of house-sitting gone wrong, describes his inspiration for book and what irks him about the interior design world.
lead_paragraph: “Care of Wooden Floors,” a novel that sprung from the author’s experience house-sitting, examines the desire for a perfect domestic life.

headline.seo: For the Author Will Wiles, House-Sitting Inspires a Novel
headline.main: Here Are My Keys. Don’t Spill Anything on the Floor.
headline.print_headline: Here Are My Keys. Don’t Spill Anything on the Floor.
